Room.Name: Waterfront Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Waterfront Way, running through the central shopping district.
Room.LongDescription: Waterfront Way runs through the southwestern shopping district, which is one of the larger areas dedicated to commerce. Most of the items for sale here are very rare and expensive, compared to other places in Oceancrest. To the north are two large buildings which run parallel to Oceanview Drive and Main Street respectively. The one directly north of here appears to be a hunting supplies store.
